UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Hylaranins: prototypes of a new class of amphibian antimicrobial peptide from the skin secretion of the oriental broad-folded frog, Hylarana latouchii.
Literature.Author: Lin Y, Hu N, Lyu P, Ma J, Wang L, Zhou M, Guo S, Chen T, Shaw C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=8 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:4% Hemolysis=16 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:23% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MBC=32µg/ml)
